principle.name: Wallaby-First Testing
principle.requirement: Use Wallaby.js for ALL test development and debugging
principle.rationale: Real-time visual feedback prevents context switching and maintains ADHD focus

principle.name: Test-Driven Development
principle.rationale: Prevents scope creep and maintains focus

principle.name: Sub-Second Feedback
principle.requirement: Every test must execute in under 500ms
principle.rationale: Maintains flow state and prevents context switching

principle.name: Minimal Output
principle.rationale: Reduces cognitive load and visual noise
